title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open the context menu, the Team entry is not present.
EB: The Team entry should be visible in the context menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the file that needs to be synchronized.
2. Right-click anywhere within the file to open the context menu.
3. Check if the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
